backend/main.mo: Implements backend actor handling per‑user chat sessions by mode, user profile storage, and access control using authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature-to-file mapping evidence for implemented requirements across study modes and chat UI components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten short summaries of major frontend files for documentation or build tooling.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS variables and theme settings, including light and dark mode color scales.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads the main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that manages mode selection and displays either the home page or the chat interface.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: UI button handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and error recovery.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting authenticated first‑time users to save their name before using the app.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatCompose: Chat input component with textarea and send button, supporting Enter‑to‑send behavior.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatPage.ts: Full chat UI for a selected mode, including thread display, quick prompts, sending messages, and clearing history.
Renders a list of chat messages with user/assistant styling and avatars.
frontend/src/components/chat/QuickPrompt: Displays mode-specific quick prompt buttons that trigger onPromptClick.
frontend/src/components/layout/SchoolLay: Provides the main app layout with header, footer, and background styling for school theme.
Defines mode metadata and quick prompt lists returned based on the selected Mode.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useChat.ts: Handles chat state, history loading, message sending, and error management per mode.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login/logout handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Fetches and saves the caller's user profile using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light/dark school-themed design.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, QueryClient, and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the landing page with selectable mode cards for different study subjects.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, store, retrieve, and clear URL and sessionStorage parameters, including support for hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for a themed UI.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature descriptions, image requirements, and current application state for planning.
